Author: Sabih
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: See my post from earlier: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2812239.msg29224049#msg29224049 Here the content of that post:   Okay, on the 20th floor are :  Thomas Klinke Immobilien GmbH -> tk-immo.de loqio GmbH -> loqio.de  On both websites are phone numbers so I called them. loqio GmbH phone is just playing music and a message that someone will pick up the phone but after 5 minutes it did not happen. But when I called the Thomas Klinke Immobilien GmbH it got interesting, because the company owner himself picked up the phone. Since you should be on the same floor, he did not know anything about a company called "SmartGenie". He said the only company on the same floor is loqio GmbH which is a call center.  EDIT: The managing director of loqio GmbH just called me back, he saw my number on his phone. He never heard anything about SmartGenie as well.   What now?  What is the legal form of your company? Why are there no photos yet? Why are you not listed in the german company database? What is your landline phone number? So many questions where you did not provide an answer for yet though I asked them many times.

Author: Sabih
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Well if you are on the 20th floor, what I already proved to be wrong, you can easily ask the other 2 companies on that floor for my phone number and call me back. loqio GmbH called me back yesterday so it would be easy for you to go few steps to your neighbor for the number and call me back. And no matter how many times you repeat it, it is not possible for me to visit a non existing company. By the way, office buildings usually have no open door so I have to ring the doorbell but there is no bell with your name, as it can be seen on my photo, because you are not there. Take your smartphone, start video at the front door where I have taken the photo and go upstairs to your office. This will take 5 minutes. Some people reacted on Telegram on my message. They can confirm that there has not been any spam. Who is your community manager, do you have a phone number? What about your own phone number? Let me call you. You probably have a landline phone in your office.  The law in germany makes it a must to be entered into the so called "Handelsregister" when revenues go beyond 250k Euros. "Handelsregister" is a database in germany where you can easily find any company. Since your softcap is 500k you should be inside this database but you are not. It is not even clear what legal form your company is.      Google translator:   Please bring your ID with you, because our lawyer will be there tomorrow, so if you come, you will be gladly shown by us. Wink This is the last time I answer your unnecessary comments here. Either you come tomorrow and you film what you want and you excuse us and all here, or do you please keep out of here Smiley Do not forget your ID card, otherwise we call the police and you will like to be interviewed by them.  Ob eine Drohung mit einem Anwalt unter diesen Voraussetzungen der richtige Weg ist sei dahingestellt. (Whether a threat with a lawyer under these conditions is the right way is an open question.) Give me the phone number of your lawyer please so I can call him if he is in the office today this should be no problem.   Entweder kommst du morgen und filmst du, was du willst und entschuldigst du von uns und allen hier, oder hältst du bitte von hier raus  This is no proper german. The right way to say this would be:   Entweder kommst du morgen und filmst, was du willst und entschuldigst dich bei uns allen oder hältst dich bitte hier raus

Author: Sabih
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: As a german I have several things to complain.  1. In germany each website has to provide an imprint. This is highly punishable in germany to not have an imprint on your website. On your website there is no imprint. The law is clear about this topic in germany. There must be a link on the startpage called "Impressum". No alterations of anything similar is allowed.  2. In germany we got a commercial register where all companies are listed: https://www.handelsregister.de/rp_web/welcome.do I can not find anything related to smartgenie there so I assume there is no company with such name.  3. Whois of smartgenie.io:    4. Inside your pdf "Terms and conditions" I see the following address:  SmartGenie.io Mundsburg Tower/Office Tower Hamburger Str. 11, 22083 Germany  This is 10 minutes by car from my home. What happens if I come around to take a look at your office? Am I welcome of will I find a postbox? I am about to buy some e-cigarette stuff around the corner of your office tomorrow. Give me a reply and I will come for a small chat and will report here. I can even capture the walk up to your office with a small peak of inside the office with my cam. Would be a good advertising or a bad one, your decision.

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Join our Telegram  |  Follow us on Twitter  |  Read our Whitepaper  |  Visit Our Website   Philippines | Hindi | Japanese | Indonesian   What is the SmartGenie.io Project?  Decentralized & Distributed Network Sharing is a platform based on Blockchain which hosts different sharing projects and application to stand with privacy and to fight with censorship!   An experienced German registered company called SmartGenie.io with more than 10 experienced and fully managed team memeber is bringing it's visions and strategie for a better life to the world and is looking for any interested participant to support the team and its projects by investing, advertising or only giving their feedbacks to our projects.   You are looking for a secure and safe solution to explore securly over internet You do not want to be tracked by the government and website owners You would like to have more location options for your VPN services You are paying for unused Internet Traffic You are looking for a secure VOIP option with more location and numbers options You can not afford the current CDN pricings from big providers like Amazon, Google, Level3, .. You are interested in sharing your home computer with others and earning money? You need to be safe and respected by your privacy You can not see your website is down, just because the database storage from provider fails  All these questions and statements are common issues some one should have during a business day, what SmartGenie.io is trying to solve is to solve these problems and building a decentralized world application to handle such issues.  For more information, please visit our webpage and join our telegram community.   What is a SMAG Token?  The SMAG Token is the utility token which will be used for accessing the SmartGenie.io Platform and its applications and to be used as the payment method in our global decentralized network for all clients.  You as a community member who wants to earn money, have to set your costs and fees as SMAG Tokens and you will receive these tokens if someone used the network over your node.  You as a community member who wants to use the network and its application, have to pay the network with SMAG Tokens.  ICO and Token Sale              Token Name                         The name of our Utility Token is SMAG which is the shortcut of SmartGenie.io             Start Date                         Pre-Sale start date is on 01.02.2018 at 00:00 UTC                         Main-Sale ICO start date is on 15.02.2018 at 00:00 UTC             Platform                         We use Ethereum as our Token-Platform, that provides really handy and stable                          Smart Contracts, which is important for our ICO and the guarantee for Investors.             Token Standard                         Our Token is based on ERC20 Token Standard in the Ethereum-Blockchain, which allows                          you to add and track this token in any external Wallets.             Token Price                         The Token Price during                                                              Pre-Sale is set to be $0.01 – $0.09 and                                                              Main-ICO it will be $0.10 – $1.00             Soft Cap                         We expect to raise a minimum of $500.000 USD to be able to launch the projects and be able                          to make the future easier for sharing network and resources. If the soft cap is not reached,                          all investments will be returned to participants automatically by the Smart Contract.             Hard Cap                         The hard cap of this Token Sale is set to be $30.000.000 USD, all unsold tokens will be burned                          and there is no ability to generate new tokens after ICO is finished. To get SMAG Tokens for earning                          and paying the community, you only have to trade these Tokens in the market.   Advantages for early Investors              Early Access                         As an investor of our ICO, you have the ability to access the beta version of applications and                          test them before they are released.             Commissions                         By using our sharing application, users have to pay fees ( SMAG Tokens ) to the node provider                          in the network, and there is always some transaction fees. You, as an Investor will be shared                          with these commissions in the future.             No usage fee                         As you are investing in our products and supporting us to be able making a better community                          for the future, your account will be granted to unlimited usage of our products for zero fees.             Trade your Token                         We are planning to list our Token in external exchanges after ICO, so you are able to trade                          the Tokens in the market and make a huge profit. You can get your SMAG Tokens for only $0.01                         per Token if you get in early, and we expect this to be valued at least $1.00 after our ICO which                         is more than %100 profit for you ( which also will be more for sure, because the token supply is                         limited and no extra Tokens will be generated after this )   Join us and secure another 10% Bonus during the Pre-ICO    Lets take a look at our website and learn more about our projects.   Follow us @             Twitter             LinkedIn             Medium             GitHub             Telegram

Author: SeveralQ
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hi everyone! Just added SmartGenie ICO to my website https://concourseq.io/Q/SmartGenie. ConcourseQ is a collaborative due diligence community that researches and reviews ICOs. Anyone with an account can submit information to your page, so we are reaching out to this community to get you all involved in the discussion. Thanks! PS: If you have any questions about filling in the info, feel free to ask us in our discord group: https://discord.gg/j8RBAwB

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hello Folks,  We just published our Bounty Thread. Please take your time and read it!  You can get free SMAG by helping us to grow!  Do not miss your chance. The Pre-Sale starts in few days.

Author: martinholly167
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hello sir, do you have any competitors? or is there any similiar projects? Your project is good and i want to compare it to others first. Maybe if you already have a comparison table or something like that, i will take a look on it. This is very interesting project.

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hello Martin,  Thanks for your question. I am not aware of all competitors, but know some of them. However, as long as I know these other companies do only work on VPN application, but we are working on 4 different projects, that are all based on Blockchain. VPN, VOIP, CDN and Database Storage.  I can prepare a list and will send you shortly.  Thanks again for your interest.

Author: ge_merlinsen
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: How much we need to invest - to get access to your beta access app?

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hello,  The minimum investment during Pre-ICO is 0.1 ETH ( Token Price on 1st Feb is only $0.01, and it will be increased following days )  With a minimum investment of 0.1ETH you are our participant and can access to our beta applications.  Thanks

Author: Exception80
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hi! Your project seems to be very interesting. But when i try to view your team linkedin and facebook profiles, most of them have links like that : https://smartgenie.io/?# . Will you fix it?

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing

Author: whatisthis
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: "An experienced German registered company"  I highly doubt it. Millions of grammar errors and misspellings on your website. Almost like online translated.

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Do you mean the German Translation?

Author: whatisthis
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Of course, I assumed as a German registered company you don't need to translate your website into German.

Author: smartgenie
Title: [ANN] [SMAG] Next generation of Decentralized and Distributed Network Sharing
Body: Hi, That is correct. But we focussed firstly on the english version and have put only a online translator for the German version, which will be fixed in few days.  If you are currently in Germany, Hamburg you can surely come and visit us
